mean_cn: n.主动权，主动性；首创精神；（重要的）法案，倡议
mean_en: the ability to decide and act on your own without waiting for somebody to tell you what to do
sentence: Her boyfriend took initiative and cleaned up after they all had dinner.
sentence_trans: 她男朋友在他们吃完晚饭后主动打扫了卫生。
word_etyma: in进入 + it行走 + iat开始 + ive名词后缀 → initiative主动
